Name: autosomal dominant macrothrombocytopenia TUBB1-related
Definition: A thrombocytopenia that is characterized by macrothrombocytopenia with normal platelet aggregation and has_material_basis_in autosomal dominant inheritance of mutation in the tubulin beta-1 (TUBB1) gene on chromosome 20q13.3.

Name: congenital amegakaryocytic thrombocytopenia
Definition: A thrombocytopenia that is characterized by a severe reduction in megakaryocyte and platelet numbers

Name: acquired thrombocytopenia
Definition: A hypersensitivity vasculitis that is characterized by purpura (purplish plaques)

Name: thrombocytopenia due to platelet alloimmunization
Definition: A connective tissue disease that develops from an antecedent Group A Streptococcal pharyngeal infection and has_symptom carditis
